name: Moshbag
tag_list: music, movies, books, art, artists, independent-music, independent-artists, musicians, writers, filmmakers, directors, cinema, publishing, music-download, digital-distribution, bands
overview:
Moshbag provides a platform for all independent musicians, film-makers, & writers to release ONLY their new, original, & unreleased single, movie or book each month. Fans & Subscribers will have the opportunity to preview all newly releasing music, movies, & books uploaded by various artists on Moshbag each month. Fans/Subscribers also get to download the entire package (all newly releasing music+movies+books) at the end of each month for a small subscription fee.

To draw an analogy, think of Moshbag as Santa Claus who distributes gifts (new music, movies, & books) made exclusively by elves (Independent musicians, writers, & filmmakers) for children whoâ€™ve been good! (subscribers who pay a small fee).
